column2: SUSTAINABLE SOURCING & MATERIALS - Discloses breakdown (% or tonnes) of types of fibres sourced annually (i.e. the fibre mix)
column3: SUSTAINABLE SOURCING & MATERIALS - Discloses a time-bound and measurable sustainable materials strategy, roadmap or targets
column4: SUSTAINABLE SOURCING & MATERIALS - Publishes annual progress on achieving sustainable material targets (e.g. what % of materials are made using conventional/virgin materials verses more sustainable materials such as organic/Fairtrade/BCI cotton, recycled/repurposed, recycled and sustainable wool, recycled polyester, chrome-free/recycled leather, sustainably sourced forest based fabrics)
column5: SUSTAINABLE SOURCING & MATERIALS - Explains what tool or process they use to define what is considered a 'sustainable' material
column6: SUSTAINABLE SOURCING & MATERIALS - Publishes measurable, time-bound targets for the reduction of textiles deriving from virgin fossil fuels
column7: SUSTAINABLE SOURCING & MATERIALS - Publishes annual progress on the reduction of textiles deriving from virgin fossil fuels
column8: SUSTAINABLE SOURCING & MATERIALS - Publishes measurable, time-bound targets for the reduction of virgin plastics for packaging (including accessories, hangers, packaging)
column9: SUSTAINABLE SOURCING & MATERIALS - Publishes annual progress on the reduction of virgin plastics for packaging (including accessories, hangers, packaging)
column10: SUSTAINABLE SOURCING & MATERIALS - Discloses what the brand is doing to minimise the impact of microfibres
